mods.note: General Note: On cover: L. Leon Bernard. General Note: Ex libris G. Cusachs. General Note: Clippings pertaining to railroads mounted on p. [2] of cover and on fly leaves. Contents: [1] Payne, B.H. Report on the Algiers and Opelousas Railroad. 1851.--[2] New Orleans, Algiers, Attakapas and pelousas Railroad Convention, New Orleans, 1851. Proceedings of the New-Orleans, Algiers, Attakapas and pelousas Railroad Convention. 1851.--[3] Southern and Western Railroad Convention, New Orleans, 1852. Address to the people of the southern and western states. 1851.--[4] New Orleans, Algiers, Attakapas, and pelousas Railroad. Executive Committee. To the members of the Permanent Committee on the New Orleans, Algiers, Atakapas and Opelousas Railroad. 1851.--[5] New Orleans, Algiers, Attakapas and pelousas Railroad Convention, New Orleans, 1852. Proceedings of the adjourned meeting of the New Orleans, Algiers, Attackapas and pelousas Railroad Convention. 1852.-- [5] New Orleans, Algiers, Attakapas and pelousas Railroad Convention, New Orleans, 1852. Proceedings of the adjourned meeting of the New Orleans, Algiers, Attackapas and pelousas Railroad Convention. 1852.--[6] Southern and Western Railroad Convention, New Orleans, 1852. Proceedings [of the convention, January 5-9, 1852] 1852.--[7] New Orleans, Opelousas and Great Western Railroad Company. Board of Directors. Address of the Board of Directors. Address of the Board of Directors of the New Orleans, pelousas and Great Western Railroad to the property holders of the city of New Orleans, June 18, 1852. 1852.--[8] New Orleans, pelousas and Great Western Railroad Company. Officers, by-laws and charter of the New Orleans, pelousas and G. Western Rail Road Company. 1852.--[9] New Orleans, Opelousas and Great Western Railroad Company. List of stockholders of the New Orleans, pelousas and Great Western Railroad Company. 1852.--[10] New Orleans, pelousas and Great Western Railroad Company. Report of the president and directors of the New-Orleans, pelousas, and Great Western Rail Road Company, to the stockholders, at their first annual meeting, 24th January, 1853. 1853.--[11] Barnes, H.E. Sketch showing the route of the New Orleans, pelousas & Great Western Rail Road through Louisiana. [1853]

titleInfo.title: Civil War Context and Conflict at LSU Libraries

mods.accessCondition: Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
